name: Twinings Superblends Sleep+ Herbal Tea with 1mg Melatonin Camomile, Cinnamon & Vanilla, Naturally Caffeine-Free, 16 Tea Bags (Pack of 1), Enjoy Hot or Iced
short_description: SWEET DREAMS WITH TWININGS SLEEPY TEA: By adding melatonin to cinnamon and vanilla herbal tea, we make bed time better; Fortify Superblends are created to enhance our already tasty tea selections; 96 Caffeine-free tea bags

SUPERBLENDS SLEEP plus MELATONIN HERBAL TEA: Camomile creates a delicate, golden infusion with a slightly sweet, floral taste; Combined with Melatonin we hope you find it useful in helping to wind down at the end of a long day

INTRODUCING NEW TWININGS FORTIFY SUPERBLENDS TEAS plus VITAMINS: New and health-conscious herbal teas that have been brilliantly crafted with added vitamins for a delicious cup of tea that tastes great and does you good
LIVE WELL + ENJOY LIFE: Tea and herbs brilliantly blended by our Master Blenders to maximize benefits and flavour; Also try our Other Superblends-Energy, Heartea and Immunity
SOURCED WITH CARE: Twinings aims to improve the lives of communities from which we source by improving access to water and sanitation, empowering women, and enhancing incomes and resilience.
product_description: At Twinings, we believe in living life well and enjoying life. Since our humble beginnings in 1706, our Master Blenders have travelled the world sourcing fine teas, herbals and botanicals to craft products that taste great and do you good. We have created our new delicious range of Superblends as small steps that can support your everyday wellbeing routine.

name: Sleep Aid Herbal Tea – Organic Calming Blend with Lemon Balm, Lavender, Linden, Chamomile, California Poppy, Passionflower, and Verbena – Supports Deep Sleep, Stress Relief and Relaxation
short_description: 🧠 Calms the Mind – California poppy, passionflower, hops, and rose petals ease anxiety and quiet racing thoughts. Naptime feeling more like a non-stop marathon? 😫 Can't catch a wink during your "rest"? 😩💤Targets three main enemies of falling asleep and getting rejuvenating sleep.
🌿 Relieves Muscle Tension – Vervain, lemon balm, linden, and lavender help relax tight muscles so your body can fully unwind and fall asleep faster. Muscle tension makes you toss and turn.

🌙 Soothes Digestion – Chamomile and oat tops calm your belly, reducing discomfort that can keep you awake at night. Indigestion makes our stomachs toss and turn. Fix it with herbs inside Sleep Aid: chamomile flowers / oats tops and straw

Caffeine-Free, Vegan & Pure – A Nighttime Ritual You’ll Love – No GMOs, no alcohol, no artificial junk. Just fragrant loose-leaf herbs and delicate flowers, hand-blended to help you relax, exhale the stress of the day, and gently drift into deep, natural sleep — without melatonin and without compromise.

About the creator: Hi, I’m Marina Buksov, a licensed pharmacist (PharmD, NY), holistic health coach, mental fitness coach, and certified herbalist. I help healthcare professionals awaken their own healing gifts by combining modern science with the wisdom of herbal and natural medicine.
🍵 Enjoy Hot or Iced – Your Way – Brew it warm for a cozy bedtime ritual, or make a concentrated version, cool it down, and pour over ice for a refreshing iced sleep tea.

DID YOU KNOW: Herbal "tea" isn't technically tea, as it's not from the Camellia Sinensis plant; "tisane" or "infusion" is a better name; Made from fruit, herbs & spices.

INDIVIDUALLY SEALED TEA BAGS STAY FRESH: Take your tea on the go in your purse, workout bag, backpack, school or work desk or car; Each tea bag is sealed for freshness so every cup of Twinings is the perfect cup of Twinings

name: Celestial Seasonings Sleepytime Extra Herbal Tea, 20 Tea Bags Box
short_description: CALMING VALERIAN BLEND: This valerian root tea combines chamomile tea and spearmint to create a Sleepytime Extra supplement that calms and relaxes
NATURALLY CAFFEINE FREE: Our bedtime tea provides a soothing experience without caffeine
NO ARTIFICIAL ADDITIVES: Our Sleepytime tea bags are great for nighttime relaxation
GLUTEN-FREE HERBAL TEA: This gluten-free tea is the perfect choice for those following a gluten-free lifestyle and offers the benefits without compromising dietary needs
MINIMAL PACKAGING: We use tea bags without strings, tags, or staples to divert waste from landfills. Plus, we print on 100% recycled paperboard (35% post-consumer content)
product_description: Celestial Seasonings Herbal Sleepytime Extra Herbal Supplement offers a calming escape for your bedtime routine. Our night time tea is crafted to help you unwind with a calming blend featuring valerian. This sleep tea for bedtime extra strength combines chamomile and spearmint with valerian root, creating a relaxing valerian tea. As a caffeine free tea, it offers a calming experience. This herbal supplement is formulated to meet your needs and nighttime wind down. WARNING: Recommended for adults only. If you are taking prescription medication, or are pregnant or nursing, consult your health care provider prior to using this product. Persons with allergies to the daisy family may be sensitive to chamomile. Do not drive or operate machinery after consuming this product. These statements have not been evaluated by the Food & Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease.

name: Bigelow Benefits Sleep Chamomile Lavender Herbal Tea, Caffeine Free, 18 Count (Pack of 6), 108 Total Tea Bags
short_description: Mellow Out: Soothing chamomile, relaxing lavender, wild orange leaves, and floral herbs are combined to support relaxation and a calm state to help get some much-deserved beauty rest
Individually Wrapped: Bigelow Tea always come individually wrapped in foil pouches for peak flavor, freshness and aroma to enjoy everywhere you go Gluten-free, calorie-free, and Kosher Certified
Individually Wrapped: Bigelow Tea always come individually wrapped in foil pouches for peak flavor, freshness and aroma to enjoy everywhere you go Gluten-free, calorie-free, and Kosher Certified

Try Every Flavor: There's a tea for morning, noon, and night time relaxation. Try our English Breakfast, Vanilla Chai, antioxidant Green Tea, decaffeinated teas, organic teas and a variety of our herbal tea bags

Blended and Packaged in the USA: In 1945 Ruth Campbell Bigelow created our first tea, Constant Comment, a strong, flavorful black tea blended with aromatic orange peel and sweet warming spices. Today, Bigelow is still 100% Family Owned
product_description: Every day is better after an amazing night of Sleep. Calming full bodied floral lavender flavor with sweet chamomile finish. All of us know how important it is to put good things in our bodies to help us stay strong. That desire was the inspiration for the Bigelow Benefits line, everyday teas that fuel your body with good for you ingredients. But of course, flavor is everything to the Bigelow family, so we designed this line to taste fabulous and help support your well-being. We believe our Benefits teas, as part of your everyday routine, can help you define the life you want to live! Caffeine Free. About the Brand The Bigelow Tea Story Beginning the moment our founder, Ruth Campbell Bigelow created "Constant Comment" Tea in her kitchen in 1945, our family has focused on just one thingtrying to make the finest teas possible. Over the years we have introduced many new flavors as well as concepts in tea. Today we offer a selection of deliciously different blends of teas and green teas, a wide variety of herbal teas and teas flavored with real fruit juice. Today Bigelow Tea is the number one specialty tea company in the United States. And to think it all began with the first legendary black tea flavored with golden orange rind and sweet spice"Constant Comment"Tea. Bigelow takes immense pride in providing the tea drinking community with the best tea at a great value. We only use hand- picked teas, real spices, flavors and herbs. The flavors and blends we have created are second to none. Some of our teas contain up to twenty different ingredients! And because tea is a leaf that can dry out we take steps to protect it. To keep the teas fresh, we seal our tea bags in protective packets. We simply have to protect those delightful flavors. Thats why a cup of Bigelow Tea is aromatic and delicious; a true indulgence for the senses.
